resources.string:
Phone and Watch need to be paired
 Bluetooth and GPS need to be enabled
 Access to the internet is required
 
 - red rectangle: north pointer
 - black circle: your location
 - green circle, red center: target
 
 - black line: direction towards target
 - distance between red lines: 1km
 
 - green triangle: peak
 - red triangle: monument
 - blue circle: weir
 - yellow square: tower
 - grey square: church
